name: auditjs
description: Audit dependencies to identify known vulnerabilities and maintenance problems

scripts.pretest: node audit.js -r -n -p test_data/package.json -w test_data/audit_package_whitelist.json || true &&  node audit.js -r -b -p test_data/bower.json || true
scripts.test: diff reports/bower.xml test_data/expected_reports/bower.xml && diff reports/package.xml test_data/expected_reports/package.xml
scripts.update-tests: npm run pretest && cp reports/*.xml test_data/expected_reports/

author: OSS Index
